summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the acquisition of, certain motor busses from the Sands Motors Company, a corporation, and payment therefor out of the funds provided for in, and designating the same as additions, betterments, and extensions contemplated by, Ordinance No. 50344; authorizing the sale of Fourteen Thousand Five Hundred Dollars ($14,500.00) of Railway Extension Utility Warrants authorized by said ordinance in order to effectuate said acquisition and payment; prescribing the interest rate on said warrants and the maturity dates, denominations and series designation thereof; and repealing all ordinances and parts of ordinances in conflict herewith.
